title: Resort Boin
synopsis: Daisuke Ichijou goes on vacation to his grandmother's beach resort. As he arrives, he admires the beautiful beach and even more beautiful ladies on it. Soon, he decides to start having fun "his own way."
characters: ['Iihara, Nao', 'Koromogae, Maya', 'Ichijou, Daisuke', 'Mika', 'Shinjou, Kanae', 'Amamiya, Momona', 'Tsukushino, Mitsugu']
